name: Magnet Master
description:
Hi! Magnet Master is a short platforming game made for ScoreSpace Jam #18. You play as a sentient magnet with the goal of reaching the end of ten levels as fast as you can. Along the way, you'll have to use your magnetic powers to reach greater heights and avoid environmental hazards.

If the controls won't work when you first launch the game, try reloading the page. I don't think that this is a common issue but I thought I'd put up a notice.

Enjoy!

Game jam disclaimer: The only assets not made during the jam's time frame were the sound effects and font.
